TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

> On 02/06/2016 at 2:28 AM, selfish\_meme said:

> I got it from Mike-NZ's shuttle extras but it does not work in 1.1.2 and you have to modify the configs to not ping pong around the place, [@Tristonwilson12](%7B___base_url___%7D/index.php?/profile/136353-tristonwilson12/) said he will add it in here
> 

May I ask you what entries you modified in order to make it work? Like increasing mass, crash tolerance and what else?  

I remember I tried to make the crawler into a usable platform back in 0.90 (when MikeNZ's shuttle was still a thing) by editing the configs and I kept on having "floating and exploding" issues with it.  

The outdated crawler itself is, by the way, still available for download over on the SSU threads.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-06-17T10:04:21Z" title="06/17/2016 10:04  AM" data-short="8 yr">June 17, 2016</time> by Dolin**

> 
> 
> 32 minutes ago, Dolin said:
> 
> 
> May I ask you what entries you modified in order to make it work? Like increasing mass, crash tolerance and what else?  
>   
> 
> I remember I tried to make the crawler into a usable platform back in 0.90 (when MikeNZ's shuttle was still a thing) by editing the configs and I kept on having "floating and exploding" issues with it.  
>   
> 
> The outdated crawler itself is, by the way, still available for download over on the SSU threads.
> 

I found taking the wheel modules out helped, then I could spawn it without explosions. Then I urned it into a static for Kerbal Konstructs and spent way too long positioning it just right so I could spawn my shuttle on top without it exploding. This is without the tracks, but they will be added soon, I just took the wheel modules out of the track configs basically.

![LeKPY8J.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/LeKPY8J.jpg)
